programme.title: Three the Hard Way
programme.desc: A record producer (Jim Brown), a PR man (Fred Williamson) and a black belt (Jim Kelly) in karate foil a racist plot to poison part of a city.

programme.title: Black Belt Jones
programme.desc: A martial artist (Jim Kelly) helps a father (Scatman Crothers) and daughter (Gloria Hendry) save their school of self-defense from Los Angeles mobsters.

programme.title: The Tattoo Connection
programme.desc: A special detective makes a foray into Hong Kong's decadent underworld in his search for a priceless stolen diamond.

programme.title: The Queen Boxer
programme.desc: An avenger (Judy Lei) of murder destroys a crime ring with her kung fu.

programme.title: The Black Dragon Vs. The Yellow Tiger
programme.desc: In one of the earliest and least-seen Bruceploitation epics, Tong Lung (THE FEROCIOUS BROTHERS) assumes the mannerisms to star in this very unofficial sequel to Bruce Lee's THE WAY OF THE DRAGON.

programme.title: Coming Soon to Soul Flix
programme.desc: Coming To Soul Flix...El Condor, The Learning Tree, The Omega Man, Caged Heat, Dolemite.

programme.title: Bruce's Deadly Fingers
programme.desc: Malicious gangsters capture Bruce's former girlfriend, then a young martial artist attempts to rescue her and the late master's book containing lethal techniques for killing with a finger.

programme.title: The Dragon Lives
programme.desc: Tracing Bruce Lee's life from college to his fascination with martial arts and development of Jeet Kune Do to his untimely death.

programme.title: Goodbye Bruce Lee: His Last Game of Death
programme.desc: Footage filmed before Lee's death in 1973 is blended with new material in this tale of a kung-fu master vs. drug lords.

programme.title: The Dragon Lives Again
programme.desc: Bruce Lee (Siu-Lung Leung) opens a gym in hell.

programme.title: Enter Three Dragons
programme.desc: Three fighters attack smuggling at its source in the port of Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Dragon, the Hero
programme.desc: A kung-fu fighter goes back to Hong Kong to help a friend fight gangsters.

programme.title: The Clones of Bruce Lee
programme.desc: A brilliant professor gathers cells from the late Bruce Lee and constructs three perfect clones. Trained to be masters, the clones battle to stop criminals and smugglers.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: A Harlem mob boss (Moses Gunn) hires a private eye (Richard Roundtree) to find his kidnapped daughter.
